00040 class CError{
00041         public: // methods
00042                 static inline void ShowMessage(IPL_MESSAGETYPE MsgType, const char* str);
00043                 static inline void ShowMessage(IPL_MESSAGETYPE MsgType, const string& str);
00044                 static inline void ShowMessage(IPL_MESSAGETYPE MsgType, const ostringstream& ost);
00045 };
00046 
00050 
00051 inline void CError::ShowMessage(IPL_MESSAGETYPE MsgType, const char* str)
00052 {
00053 /* return if DISABLE is enabled and equals the given MsgType */
00054 #ifdef DISABLE_IPL_ERROR
00055         if (MsgType==IPL_ERROR)
00056                 return;
00057 #elif defined DISABLE_IPL_WARNING
00058         if (MsgType==IPL_WARNING)
00059                 return;
00060 #endif
00061         ostringstream Output;
00062         if (MsgType==IPL_ERROR)
00063         {
00064                 Output << "IPL_ERROR: " << str;
00065         }
00066         else if (MsgType==IPL_WARNING)
00067         {
00068                 Output << "IPL_WARNING: " << str;
00069         }
00070         else if (MsgType==IPL_NORMAL)
00071         {
00072                 Output << "IPL_NOTE: " << str;
00073         }
00074         else
00075         {
00076                 /* should not be possible to get here! */
00077                 Output << "Error: ShowMessage() unknown message type";
00078         }
00079         cout << Output.str().c_str() << endl;
00080 #ifdef IPL98_ERRORS_TO_WINDOW
00081         AddIPL98ErrorHistory(Output.str().c_str());
00082 #endif
00083 }
00084 
00085 inline void CError::ShowMessage(IPL_MESSAGETYPE MsgType, const string& str)
00086 {
00087         ShowMessage(MsgType, str.c_str());
00088 }
00089 
00090 inline void CError::ShowMessage(IPL_MESSAGETYPE MsgType, const ostringstream& ost)
00091 {
00092         ShowMessage(MsgType, ost.str().c_str());
00093 }
00094 
00095 } // end namespace ipl

00097 #endif //_IPL98_ERROR_H
